verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1692>closely<s%> <S%H1692>pursued<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> and Malchi-shua, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H3513>became<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H7198><s%> <S%H4672>overtook<s%> him; and he was <S%H9123>wounded<s%> by the <S%H3384>archers.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H8025>"Draw<s%> your <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> me <S%H1856>through<s%> with it, <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H9412>abuse<s%> me." But his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not, for he was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on it.

And when his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> he <S%H1571>likewise<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H4191>died.<s%>
Thus <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> with his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [those] of his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>

When <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they had <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in them.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day,<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

So they <S%H6584>stripped<s%> him and <S%H5375>took<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> [messengers] <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to <S%H1319>carry<s%> the good <S%H1319>news<s%> to their <S%H6091>idols<s%> and to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And they <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1538>head<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon.<s%>
When <S%H3605>all<s%> Jabesh-gilead <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%>

<S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> away the <S%H1480>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1480>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak<s%> in <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> for his <S%H4604>trespass<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he did not <S%H8104>keep;<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> because he <S%H7592>asked<s%> counsel of a <S%H178>medium,<s%> <S%H1875>making<s%> <S%H1875>inquiry<s%> [of it],

and did not <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Therefore He <S%H4191>killed<s%> him, and <S%H5437>turned<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse.<s%>
